Name: Brute
Description: A character who uses strength and combat to solve problems. Proficient with many types of weapons.

Name: Scoundrel
Description: A character who uses deception and sneakiness to accomplish their goals. Excels at stealth attacks and thievery.

Name: Ascetic
Description: A character who focuses on disciplining mind and body. They use a combination of combat and intellect.
Requirements: 10 Errands Complete, Virtue of 100, Willpower of 4

Name: Survivalist
Description: A character who utilizes their environment to adapt and thrive. Excellent at long ranged weaponry and exploration.

Name: Philosopher
Description: A character who uses intellect to solve problems. Excels at any task requiring powers of the mind.

Name: Opportunist
Description: A character who solves problems using speech and dialogue.
